Description_lang: Conjures a barrier out of storm magic, absorbing $391050s2 damage plus consuming any remaining $@spellname391031 nearby to increase this amount.Upon expiration, any remaining damage in the absorb shield detonates, inflicting Nature damage plus additional Nature damage over time to enemies within $391130A1 yards.
AuraDescription_lang: Absorbs $391050w2 damage.Explodes for ${$391050w2/2} Nature damage and an additional ${$391050w2/2} over $391130D upon expiration.
